all: Ability to hunt down the right people for requirements and feedback

jd: From: Shubhra Soni, Sonitalent shubhra.soni@sonitalentcorp.com Reply to: shubhra.soni@sonitalentcorp.com Hi, Hope you are doing well,We are looking for Senior Web/UI Developer if you are interested kindly send me your updated resume. Title: Senior Web/UI Developer Duration: 6 months +Reston, VA – needs to be close to this location but it will be a remote position This group owns a Java Application and it's one of the few Java Applications that actually has a frontend. Home Price is the name of the application and model. A UI developer contractor from another company is not performing so we can replace him. This team has built their own frontend and as such wants the resource to have design skills (more senior) and must be able to communicate well. Resource should be knowledgable and experienced with Microservices and API's and how UIs or GUI's work with them.Java backend skills are desirable. SQL always a big plus but doesn't have to be a guru. AWS services S3 and ECS are nice to have..... we would want some AWS experience.Top 3 Technical Skills:Angular 10UI Design skillsMicroservices....interfaces to Microservices and API'sJava for backend and middle tierSQLAWS services (S3, ECS...) Top 3 Soft Skills:Strong Communication skillsFast moving environment.... pick up things quicklyability to hunt down the right people for requirements and feedback, TENACIOUS Thanks & RegardShubhra SoniTechnical Recruiter| Sonitalent Corp.Email id : shubhra.soni@sonitalentcorp.com Desk | (859) 659 - 3432 EXT 211Address - 5404 Merri brook Lane, Prospect, KY, USA
